mapper.select: SELECT cont.*, cate.* FROM cont JOIN cate ON cont.cate_no = cate.cate_no ORDER BY cont.cont_view DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT cont.*, cate.*, IFNULL(AVG(review.review_star), 0) AS average_star FROM cont JOIN cate ON cont.cate_no = cate.cate_no LEFT JOIN review ON cont.cont_no = review.cont_no GROUP BY cont.cont_no ORDER BY average_star DESC LIMIT 4
